description_for_model: Musashi provides AI-powered sentiment analysis and prediction market signals for automated trading. Connects via Chrome Extension messaging to analyze Twitter/X news in real-time and generate trading signals for 500+ Polymarket and Kalshi markets. Supports news-based trading, market monitoring, and portfolio optimization strategies.
description_for_human: AI-powered sentiment analysis and prediction market signals for Twitter/X content. Free API for trading bots.

auth.instructions: No authentication required. Musashi uses Chrome extension permissions. Only accepts connections from localhost/127.0.0.1.

endpoints.name: get_news_analyses
endpoints.description: Get AI sentiment analysis for trending news stories on Twitter/X
endpoints.returns: Array of NewsAnalysis objects with sentiment, confidence, reasoning, and related markets

endpoints.name: get_market_signals
endpoints.description: Get sentiment signals and trading recommendations for prediction markets

parameters.marketId: Optional string to filter by specific market

endpoints.returns: Array of MarketSignal objects with sentiment, action, and confidence scores

endpoints.name: get_all_markets
endpoints.description: Get complete database of 500+ prediction markets from Polymarket and Kalshi
endpoints.returns: Array of Market objects with prices, volume, and metadata

endpoints.name: health_check
endpoints.description: Verify Musashi extension is running and responsive
endpoints.returns: Health status, version, markets loaded count, and last update timestamp

confidence_levels.description: All signals include confidence scores from 0.0 to 1.0

pricing.user_requirements: Chrome browser with Musashi extension installed
